if(NOT DEFINED CCOS_THIRDPARTY_MTP_ACTIVE OR NOT DEFINED CCOS_BUILDLEVEL)
elseif(${CCOS_THIRDPARTY_MTP_ACTIVE} GREATER ${CCOS_BUILDLEVEL})
  if( LINUX )
    find_package(Mtp QUIET)
    if( MTP_FOUND )

      message("- MTP found")
      set( MTP_FOUND       ${MTP_FOUND}       PARENT_SCOPE)
      set( MTP_LIB_DIR     ${MTP_LIB_DIR}     PARENT_SCOPE)
      set( MTP_LIBRARIES   ${MTP_LIBRARIES}   PARENT_SCOPE)

    elseif(${CCOS_THIRDPARTY_MTP_ACTIVE} GREATER 2)
      message( FATAL_ERROR "- mtp marked as required, but not found on system. Please install libmtp-dev" )
    else()
      set(CCOS_THIRDPARTY_MTP_ACTIVE FALSE)
    endif()
  elseif(${CCOS_THIRDPARTY_MTP_ACTIVE} GREATER 2)
    message( FATAL_ERROR "- mtp marked as required, but not found on system. Please install libmtp-dev" )
  else()
    set(CCOS_THIRDPARTY_MTP_ACTIVE FALSE)
  endif()
endif()
